reviews.review_msg: she is a very principled woman, I do not advise you to take her

She will never let you pass ALC (idk if it's the FIC's conspiracy by giving students B- grades so that we all have to do ALC). She said class test was good but all you get is B (no one in class ever got A). However, she's caring, chill her lectures are good for fundamental English but too easy for me. Overall, 6k more? It wastes time and money
Avoid this professor whatever you do, very many homework and she grades very hardly(even you do good, or better than the other, she still grades the same.

Many of you will say that this course is extra-hard. Others will say that the professor is stringent. On the one hand, yes. Class is challenging for those who don't really understand English, but on the other hand, it's the main goal of this course. If you have difficulties with language understanding get ready to learn and practice a lot.
Avoid her with your life, unless you want to take the ACL 099 class.

Would not recommend this prof. She will not grade you more than a B. However, you want to pass this course on B+ to skip ALC099. The professor just said at the beginning of the class that only exceptional students get B+.
